<title>Maximum Resumes</title><info>The maximum resume number that a member can create.</info>

<title>Checking Approval Mode</title><info>Setup the approval mode for manually approving the members' resumes or automatically approving them.</info>
Setup the required section for a resume. Values that are available are: experience, education, skills, certification, language, publication and addition.

phrase.var_name: "Maximum resumes that are active for each user group" must be greater than or equal to 0
"Maximum number of categories that a resume can include" must be greater than 0
"Maximum number of viewers that showed on "Who's viewed me"" must be greater than or equal to 0
"Maximum resume" must be greater than or equal to 0

phrases.phrase: <title>Pagination Style</title><info>Select Pagination Style at Search Page.</info>

Meta keywords that will be displayed on sections related to the Resume app. To edit this setting, please go to AdminCP > Globalization > Phrases, search and edit phrase have var name is: "seo_resume_meta_keywords"
Meta description added to pages related to the Resume app. To edit this setting, please go to AdminCP > Globalization > Phrases, search and edit phrase have var name is: "seo_resume_meta_description"
